info.title: E-Commerce API
info.description: API documentation for E-Commerce platform with role-based access control

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of all orders with filtering options

post.description: Create a new order for any customer

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific order

patch.description: Update the status of any order with workflow validation
Update the payment status of any order

post.description: Cancel any order and restore inventory

get.description: Retrieve all pending orders

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of orders to return

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive order statistics across all vendors
Retrieve paginated list of all products with filtering options

post.description: Create a new product for any vendor

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product
Full-text search across product name, description, SKU

post.description: Import multiple products from CSV data

get.description: Retrieve all products with stock below threshold

post.description: Register a new user account with role selection
Authenticate user and get access token
Get a new access token using refresh token

get.description: Get current authenticated user information
Retrieve paginated list of orders (customers see only their own)

post.description: Place a new order with multiple items (Customer only)

message.example: Some items are not available in requested quantity

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific order (Customers can only view their own orders)

403.description: Forbidden - Customers can only view their own orders

put.description: Update the status of an order through its workflow (Admin/Vendor only). Valid transitions: pendingprocessing, processingshipped, shippeddelivered. Cannot update cancelled or delivered orders.

403.description: Forbidden - Customers cannot update order status

post.description: Cancel an order and restore inventory. Orders can only be cancelled if status is 'pending' or 'processing'. Shipped and delivered orders cannot be cancelled.

message.example: Cannot cancel order. Only pending and processing orders can be cancelled

403.description: Forbidden - Customers can only cancel their own orders

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of products with optional filtering and search. Admin only.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Full-text search on product name and description

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Sort order (asc or desc, default: desc)

post.description: Create a new product. Admin only.

description.example: Ergonomic wireless mouse with USB receiver

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product. Admin only.

put.description: Update an existing product. Admin only.

delete.description: Soft delete a product. Admin only.

post.description: Import multiple products from a CSV file. Admin only.

file.description: CSV file with products (headers: name, sku, price, category_id, description, stock_quantity, etc.)

get.description: Full-text search on product name and description. Admin only.
Retrieve paginated list of orders containing vendor's products
Retrieve detailed information about order containing vendor's products

patch.description: Update status of order containing vendor's products (limited transitions)

403.description: Forbidden - Not your order or invalid status

get.description: Retrieve order statistics for vendor's products only
Retrieve recent orders containing vendor's products

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to look back

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of orders to return

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of products owned by authenticated vendor

post.description: Create a new product for authenticated vendor

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about vendor's own product
Full-text search within vendor's own products
Retrieve vendor's products with stock below threshold

post.description: Import multiple products for authenticated vendor

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Order model with items, customer, and invoice information

OrderItem.title: Order Item
OrderItem.description: Individual item within an order with product snapshot

OrderRequest.title: Order Request
OrderRequest.description: Request body for creating a new order

description.example: Ergonomic wireless mouse with USB receiver

ProductRequest.title: Product Request
ProductRequest.description: Request body for creating or updating a product

vendor_id.description: Vendor ID (optional for vendors, required for admin)

description.example: Ergonomic wireless mouse with USB receiver

sale_price.description: Sale price (must be less than regular price)

User.title: User
User.description: User model with authentication and profile information

bearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token in the format: Bearer {token}

tags.name: Admin - Products
tags.description: Admin product management endpoints - Full CRUD operations for products
